name: DelChunk
description: Deletes a specific chunk type from all gmo and amd files in a directory

name: GmoAnimOffset
description: Offsets a specified gmo animation by a specified amount of frames

name: MergeGmoMotions
description: Imports gmo and gms/mds motions from a specified folder to a selected input file

name: GmoReplaceModel
description: Replaces model data inside of a gmo model while leaving other data intact
